snippet.title: Citizens of Space | Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Citizens of Space launches for the PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC for Steam on June 18, 2019! The follow-up to 2015’s constituent-pleasing Citizens of Earth features an all-new combat system, deeper recruitment mechanics, and plenty of unique worlds to explore!

Official website: http://www.atlus.com/citizensofspace
